title: Plat+ LF Top, Mid and Support for 5s team.
body:
Starting a ranked 5s team. Roles needed.
Mid

Please be Plat 5+

Tell us about you

Ig:
Champions:
Chat programs:
Time Zone:
Extra info:

replies.body:
IG: On My Wings

Champs:  Been playing mid since season 2, can pretty much play them all.  Main Anivia, Swain
Chat programs:  Skype, curse voice.
Time Zone: Eastern
Info:  I have tons of experience with teams, have been playing for a long time.  Looking for a fun team to play with!

Ig: ImTryingToLearn
Champions: {{champion:103}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:101}} 
Chat programs: Skype, Raidcall, Mumble, Teamspeak, Vent, most everything.
Time Zone: Central
Extra info: Have experience in lots of teams and played in a few tournaments.

IG: Ovoro
Role: Support
Champions: {{champion:432}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:111}}  {{champion:412}} i can play anyone support.
Communication: Teamspeak prefered, anything but raidcall
Time zone: Mountain
Extra Info: Im Diamond 5, looking to play team ranked, if you are a serious team and want to get to challenger, im not your guy. i play to just have a ranked team and have fun/win. not looking to go into competitive play. Tournaments are fine though :)
